## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                     | Type     | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `extClass` | `ext-class` | 额外的类名，添加到根节点的元素上                | `string` | `undefined` |
| `offset`   | `offset`    | 栅格左侧的偏移格数                       | `number` | `0`         |
| `span`     | `span`      | 栅格占位格数，为 0 时相当于 `display: none` | `number` | `0`         |
